original: Lundmarker, Vilhelm Carl, häradshövding, Amål, f. 15/12/84 i Lidköp. av bankdir. Wilh. L. o. Caroline Alm-blad. G. 19 m. Bertha Regner. Barn: Anne-Marie f. 22, g, 45 m. civ:ing., löjtn. Bengt Ragnar Olow. — Stud:ex. i Vänersborg 02, jur. utr. kand. i Upps. 06. V. här :hövd. 18, här :hövd. i Anger-manl. v. doms. 25 i Tösslbo o. Vedbo dom’S. sed. 36, krigsdom. v. Väster-norrl. reg. o. Norrl. trängkår 32-36. KN02kl.
translated: Lundmarker, Vilhelm Carl, magistrate, Amål, b. 15/12/84 in Lidköping, son of bank director Wilh. L. and Caroline Alm-blad. Married in 19 m. Bertha Regner. Children: Anne-Marie b. 22, married in 45 to civilian engineer, Lieutenant Bengt Ragnar Olow. Completed high school in Vänersborg in 02, graduated with a law degree in Uppsala in 06. Became magistrate in 18, magistrate in Angermanland provincial court in 25 in Tösslbo and Vedbo districts until 36, military judge in Väster-norrland regiment and Norrland transport corps from 32-36. Knight of the Royal Order of the North Star (KN02kl)..

awards.name: Knight of the Royal Order of the North Star
